header.rec_loc: A meeting room in an office, Cambridge
header.topics: Stand-up comedy, sport, holidays, university, food and cooking, work, the Internet, family, punctuation, advertising
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, anecdote telling, telling jokes
